title: HeavensPro
author: HeavensPro
content: I've invested some money in it and waiting for its growth but it's kinda stable rn. Also I'm wodering should i invest more moeny in it or no. When do you think it will grow and will it grow at all? Really want to hear the opinion of some more experienced traders

comments.author: Anonylz
comments.body: Quote from: HeavensPro on July 20, 2022, 03:22:37 PMI've invested some money in it and waiting for its growth but it's kinda stable rn. Also I'm wodering should i invest more moeny in it or no. When do you think it will grow and will it grow at all? Really want to hear the opinion of some more experienced tradersUsually, you ask these questions before investing and not the other way round, I have never heard of this TON project before now, and since you already invested I guess there is nothing more anyone can say, between I see about 3 projects with a similar ticker on coingecko so it is kinda hard to know which among them you are referring to. You should do your research more about the project before putting more funds, you know alts are risky investments.

comments.author: Lantind
comments.body: Quote from: HeavensPro on July 20, 2022, 03:22:37 PMI've invested some money in it and waiting for its growth but it's kinda stable rn. Also I'm wodering should i invest more moeny in it or no. When do you think it will grow and will it grow at all? Really want to hear the opinion of some more experienced tradersThere is no need to invest more money, you need to make a percentage of the investment in altcoins or other forms of coins, because under certain conditions you can get out of the market chaos that affects any of the coins you own, therefore there is no need to invest a high percentage other than in potential coins, moreover coin growth has different levels and times, if we only focus on one coin, then the investment will not be maximized

comments.author: Tony116
comments.body: Quote from: HeavensPro on July 20, 2022, 03:22:37 PMI've invested some money in it and waiting for its growth but it's kinda stable rn. Also I'm wodering should i invest more moeny in it or no. When do you think it will grow and will it grow at all? Really want to hear the opinion of some more experienced tradersWhy so many newbies often find coins very strange and they are not talked about much by other investors. They are looking for something that can make them rich fast, but do they think about the risks they are taking ? I'm completely unfamiliar with the coin you're referring to, I advise you not to invest in it if it is not top coin.Quote from: Anonylz on July 20, 2022, 03:34:46 PMI see about 3 projects with a similar ticker on coingecko so it is kinda hard to know which among them you are referring to. You should do your research more about the project before putting more funds, you know alts are risky investments. When I search on CMC, I see only 2 TON tokens, so I don't know which one the OP is referring to. However, the overall potential of 2 tokens is zero.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: Shit token.See the community new hastag $TON on twitter is dead, the volume is dead. A token with 19,000$, I bet my entire life saving this volume only came from bot trading from Gate Exchange.Sold and buy a real coin/token.

comments.author: Natalim
comments.body: Quote from: HeavensPro on July 20, 2022, 03:22:37 PMI've invested some money in it and waiting for its growth but it's kinda stable rn. Also I'm wodering should i invest more moeny in it or no. When do you think it will grow and will it grow at all? Really want to hear the opinion of some more experienced tradersI'm not sure if this is what you mean, https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/toncoin/Well, I'd never see its huge market potential and it was a risky investment (new project). And since you already have some, just keep it but never think to add more and also think it gives you a good profit. Before investing, tried to look at the performance of the project in 1 month and 1week, at least you have some idea of what possibly it happens next. Don't rely on the news as likey they are just FUDs and manipulated.

comments.author: shinratensei_
comments.body: This project doesn't seem to be a good project. The development was running before but not for now. The TON blockchain is not so useful like what already expected by people in the past. I meant i have ever used this blockchain and it's so complicated unlike the existing blockchain in the market. Just wanna see whether people are still interesting with this project. The project is so bad for me now. People already forgotten it. I think that if that's not gonna be a good decision to invest on it.

comments.author: AmoreJaz
comments.body: Quote from: ryzaadit on July 20, 2022, 11:15:37 PMShit token.See the community new hastag $TON on twitter is dead, the volume is dead. A token with 19,000$, I bet my entire life saving this volume only came from bot trading from Gate Exchange.Sold and buy a real coin/token.the OP should at least give the link of the project that he is referring to. if he is talking about this TON - https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/tokamak-network, their ATH was more than 30 bucks, and it is barely touching the 2 bucks rights now. if the OP wants a sincere opinion on this matter, he needs to do his own assessment of this token and see if there are opinions based on what's really happening to this project. most people don't know this token, so they will just give baseless opinions.

comments.author: Kavelj22
comments.created_time: July 20, 2022, 11:49:31 PMLast edit: July 24, 2022, 05:39:02 PM by Kavelj22
comments.body: Quote from: HeavensPro on July 20, 2022, 03:22:37 PMI've invested some money in it and waiting for its growth but it's kinda stable rn. Also I'm wodering should i invest more moeny in it or no. When do you think it will grow and will it grow at all? Really want to hear the opinion of some more experienced tradersA strong project. I followed since it was running in the ethereum blockchain before lunching its own network.Unfortunetly, no much known dapps built out there. The only strong project is Usdt Trc20 which is just another copy of any other alternatives.Edit: I'm so sorry for the inattention. I thought you meant Project Tron and not Telegram's TON coin. Anyway, this project, in my opinion, is not gaining enough popularity, and I thought it was over until the time I read the comments here, and it seems that there are still those who support it. Personally, I would not encourage investing in it at this particular time because no one knows how long this stagnation will last.

comments.author: masterrex
comments.body: Quote from: HeavensPro on July 20, 2022, 03:22:37 PMI've invested some money in it and waiting for its growth but it's kinda stable rn. Also I'm wodering should i invest more moeny in it or no. When do you think it will grow and will it grow at all? Really want to hear the opinion of some more experienced tradersI'm confused about which TON project you invest, in because as far as I know, the original TON project that represented the Telegram Open Network (TON) was already canceled due to legal reasons so in that case, I am pretty sure that the TON project you mentioned is not the TON of Telegram, thats why I don't think it will be a big prospect since the investors interest is not that big compared to the previous Telegram TON project.

comments.author: TastyChillySauce00
comments.body: There are two TON tokens ever exist. One being developed by the chinese developers and another one from the russian developers. Both of ton coins already abandoned by people. TON is not getting hyped again. The trading volume from both were decreasing a lot that means if people didn't interested anymore to bought the projects that didn't even have promising future. You must be careful when trying to buy some coins like TON coins. Both were not even reliable to be called as a blockchain coin. The mechanism is very complicated for adopters to use it. Both were failed blockchains.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: HeavensPro on July 20, 2022, 03:22:37 PMI've invested some money in it and waiting for its growth but it's kinda stable rn. Also I'm wodering should i invest more moeny in it or no. When do you think it will grow and will it grow at all? Really want to hear the opinion of some more experienced tradersTo find out the potential price of a crypto asset, we must first know its utility and use-case. After seeing the explanation about Toncoin from the official website, I got several conclusions, such as Toncoin is better than Ethereum 2.0 and also Solana in terms of Blockchain analysis.In addition, these Toncoins also already have their own ecosystem which we can see in its entirety on this page. IMO, this Toncoin is quite promising to invest because in addition to the many utilities and use-cases, this Toncoin is also the native token of the Telegram application.References:[1] https://ton.org/[2] https://ton.app/

comments.author: RussianEnglishTranslation
comments.body: Quote from: HeavensPro on July 20, 2022, 03:22:37 PMI've invested some money in it and waiting for its growth but it's kinda stable rn. Also I'm wodering should i invest more moeny in it or no. When do you think it will grow and will it grow at all? Really want to hear the opinion of some more experienced tradersTON could do well long term but short term, they were really hurt by the SEC lawsuit. Besides, many projects on Telegram have tipping bots, like 0xMR, so TON integration is not as important as it sounds. I think the end goal is to make Telegram a crypto wallet.

comments.author: smartaction
comments.body: Quote from: HeavensPro on July 20, 2022, 03:22:37 PMI've invested some money in it and waiting for its growth but it's kinda stable rn. Also I'm wodering should i invest more moeny in it or no. When do you think it will grow and will it grow at all? Really want to hear the opinion of some more experienced tradersIf you asking for Toncoin (TON). then i will advise you do not invest much money on there. TON token already listed on FTX, GATE IO, OKK and more good exchange. But its demand in the market is very low.  Despite being listed on good exchanges, its trade volume is relatively low. So you shouldn’t invest your big fund here. You can bought TON for small amount if you are interested on it. but do a better research before investment

comments.author: m2017
comments.body: Quote from: tsaroz on July 20, 2022, 03:28:53 PMQuote from: HeavensPro on July 20, 2022, 03:22:37 PMI've invested some money in it and waiting for its growth but it's kinda stable rn. Also I'm wodering should i invest more moeny in it or no. When do you think it will grow and will it grow at all? Really want to hear the opinion of some more experienced tradersThere are a lot of coins that calls themselves TON. Not sure which you are talking about.The original and popular project from Telegram founder called TON (Telegram open network) was abandoned after lack of progress and it's initial investors were refunded. There's no more TON tokens from telegram. That is why, investing in any coin called TON looks like "just giving" your money to dubious individuals who are trying to use this name for their own selfish purposes. As already mentioned, project from telegram TON is officially closed, which means that any project using a similar name should be avoided. Of course, if you are not ready to give away your money to everyone without the hope of getting it back. I would not recommend that you invest any more money in this and would try to get rid of this dubious asset. Whether to listen to my words or not is up to you.

comments.author: Vaskiy
comments.body: It can be a good investment for long term. Based on the coinmarketcap data, it is placed at 209th position among the listed coins. Haven't got listed on Binance, and getting listed on Binance will push the market. For now it has reached its ATH value above $5 and low value at $0.39It looks like following the footprints of ethereum, because the process flow and development is something similar to ethereum. Recently they've started the domain name services same as eth.

It is too risky.Moreover, during this bearish era, we don't know if they can survive and then continue to rise up until reaching their ATH or not. I will prefer investing more on Bitcoin..

comments.author: makishart
comments.body: The development progress is not so good. The progress is too slow compared with another token in the market. You shall avoid to invest in this project. Stop to waste your money for shit token like this. Even there was toncoin that already listed in so many exchange sites but you must alsos ee the reality of toncoin has no demand at all. People didn't even care anymore about ton coin. Profit maker has become the main thing that searched by so many people these days. Ton coin full with BS.
